## Review ALL

Review dataset, Figure, Table, cppModel, ctlModel, Script

```{r }

renderUI({ 
  
  
figure = NULL
tdata = data.frame(xvar=1:10, yvar=1:10)
figLn <- ggplot(tdata, aes(x=xvar, y=yvar)) + geom_point() + geom_line()
figLog <- figLn + scale_y_log10()

fig <- figLn
attr(fig, 'title') <- paste0(
  "Mean(±SE) ", " in Serum vs Nominal Sampling Day Following Subcutaneous or Intravenous Dose(s) of ", ")")

attr(fig, 'width') <- 9
attr(fig, 'height') <- 6                                
figure[["pk_mean_profile_ln"]] = fig 
figure[["pk_mean_profile_ln"]]$data =  tdata


fig <- figLog
attr(fig, 'title') <- paste0(
  "Semi-Log Mean(±SE) ", " in Serum vs Nominal Sampling Day Following Subcutaneous or Intravenous Dose(s) of ", ")")

attr(fig, 'width') <- 9
attr(fig, 'height') <- 6                                
figure[["pk_mean_profile_log"]] = fig 
figure[["pk_mean_profile_log"]]$data =  tdata


ALL$FIGURE = figure


tabl = data.frame(x=1, y=1)
attr(tabl, 'title') <-  "tst1"
ALL$TABLE[["TSET1"]] = tabl

tabl = data.frame(x=10, y=10)
attr(tabl, 'title') <-  "tst2"
ALL$TABLE[["TSET2"]] = tabl

tabl = data.frame(x=1, y=1)
attr(tabl, 'title') <-  "tst1"
ALL$DATA[["TSET1"]] = tabl

tabl = data.frame(x=10, y=10)
attr(tabl, 'title') <-  "tst2"
ALL$DATA[["TSET2"]] = tabl

isolate({ 

ALL$cppModel= list()

cppModel=mread(model='cppModel',
              project=paste0(HOME, '/cpp/'),
              quiet=TRUE,
              file=basename("LN001.cpp"))

ALL$cppModel[["LN0011.cpp"]] = cppModel

# print("01")
# print(see(cppModel))
# print(see(ALL$cppModel[["LN0011.cpp"]]))

cppModel=mread(model='cppModel',
             project=paste0(HOME, '/cpp/'),
             quiet=TRUE,
             file=basename("LN001.cpp"))

ALL$cppModel[["LN0022.cpp"]] = cppModel
# print("02")
# print(see(cppModel))
# print(see(ALL$cppModel[["LN0022.cpp"]]))

})

  callModule(dataReview, "mydataReview", ALL)
  
  callModule(figReview, "myfigureReview",  ALL)
  
  callModule(tablReview, "mytableReview",  ALL)
  
  callModule(cppModelReview, "mycppModelReview", ALL)
  
  callModule(ctlModelReview, "myctlModelReview", ALL)  
  
  callModule(checkOut, "mycheckOut", ALL)  


  
tabBox(width=12, id = ("review_all"), title =NULL, 
  
  tabPanel(title="Data",  icon = icon("database", lib = "font-awesome"),
          dataReviewUI(id="mydataReview", label="")
  ), 
  
  tabPanel(title="Figure",  icon = icon("bar-chart-o", lib = "font-awesome"),
           figReviewUI(id="myfigureReview", label="")
  ), 
   
 tabPanel(title="Table", icon = icon("table", lib = "font-awesome"),
          tablReviewUI(id="mytableReview", label="")
 ),
   
  tabPanel(title="cppModel", icon = icon("motorcycle", lib = "font-awesome"),
           cppModelReviewUI(id="mycppModelReview", label="")
  ),

  tabPanel(title="ctlModel", icon = icon("motorcycle", lib = "font-awesome"),
          ctlModelReviewUI(id="myctlModelReview", label="")
  ),

   tabPanel(title="Checkout", 
           checkOutUI(id="mycheckOut", label="") 
   )
)  
   

})

   

```
